Translations.Text: Zai zuida de xingfa zhiqian, wo bi shi tamen changshi zuijin de xingfa, yibian tamen huiwu.
Youren yi zhu de jixiang quan jie ta, er ta bu ken tingcong, zheyang de ren, shui bi ta hai buyi ne? Wo biran yao cheng hao fanzui de ren.
Wo que yi ba jingdian shangci mu sa, suoyi nimen duiyu jieshou jingdian, buyao xianyu youyu zhong, wo ceng yi na bu jingdian wei yiselie houyi de xiangdao.
Wo ceng yi tamen zhong de yibufen renwei biaoshuai, dang tamen renshou jiannan, quexin wo de jixiang de shihou, feng wo de mingling qu yindao zhongren.
Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu biding panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei.
Nandao tamen hai bu xiaode ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen changchang jingguo naxie ren de guxiang, zai nali que you xuduo jixiang. Tamen zenme bu tingcong ne?
Tamen hai bu zhidao ma? Wo ba yushui gan dao wu cao di difang, er jie ta shengchu tamen de shengchu he tamen ziji suo shi de zhuangjia. Nandao tamen kan bujian ma?
Tamen shuo:`Zhe zhong panjue shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.'
Ni shuo:`Buxindao zhe, zai panjue ri, sui xin wuyi, bingqie bu huode kuandai.'
Ni yingdang bi kai tamen, ni yingdang dengdai, tamen biding shi dengdai de.
